## IRangeDisplayOptions interface

Options to use with `DisplayContainer.addRange(objects)`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IRangeDisplayOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [arrangement?](./bge-core.irangedisplayoptions.arrangement.md) |  | [Arrangement](./bge-core.arrangement.md) | _(Optional)_ Strategy to use when arranging child objects, defaults to <code>Auto</code>. |
|  [avoid?](./bge-core.irangedisplayoptions.avoid.md) |  | [Footprint](./bge-core.footprint.md) | _(Optional)_ Optional area to avoid when positioning child objects. |
|  [childOptions?](./bge-core.irangedisplayoptions.childoptions.md) |  | [IDisplayOptions](./bge-core.idisplayoptions.md) \| [IDisplayOptions](./bge-core.idisplayoptions.md)<!-- -->\[\] | _(Optional)_ Either a single <code>IDisplayOptions</code> that will be used with every child object, or an array containing separate options for each child. |
